extendedInfo.description: The crazy penguins are back to continue the fight in this all-new sequel to a top downloaded brand for the birds which are very angry at the polar beers! Defend the Arctic from the invading Polar Bears by catapulting Penguins in this smashmouth two-in-one game! Play over 50 levels in Campaign Mode or blast away in 20 explosive new Frenzy Mode levels to tactically bring down many Bears at once! Earn achievements and unlock secret Brotherhood of super-powered penguins including Bomber Penguin, Armor Penguin, and Glider Penguin. But watch out for the Polar Bearsâ newest allies: the Pandas! Didnât get a perfect score? Retry levels to get the highest score possible with endless replay value.Keywords:CrazyPenguinAssaultAttackbirdangryfrenzycatapultpolarbear

reviews.title: Aweful
reviews.comment: I was playing this game in my nokia phone... I think it will be better in android... But in nokia it was better.... Note: the touch is bad in this game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor Angry Birds clone
reviews.comment: Annoing ads popping up over ui buttons making it impossible to ignore the ad. When it is tapped Play Store opens and if no download is made every other attempt to launch this game leads to Play Store. Uninstalled immediately. Crazy Pinguin Catapult on my old java SonyEricsson was my everyday game. Sad.

reviews.title: Used to love the Java version...
reviews.comment: As I said, I used to love this game, especially when I had it in my old Java phone (the first time I played this game). Now, its not nice in my Android phone. IT\'S CROPPED! My phone is not widescreen. UNINSTALL!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Very bad waste of time and net to download this game It is not at all good. It was a very good game in nokia but in android, my all expectation went in water
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The whole game is just sloppy and not fun. I dknt recommend it.

reviews.comment: What this is a really rubbish game its glithchy when I killed the polar bear it didn\'t die on leval Three on frenzy\tI don\'t like the game
reviews.author: Chris Dunn

reviews.title: Not as good as crazy penguin 1
reviews.comment: Used to play crazy penguin catapult on my nokia mobile when i see penguins from Madagascar movies i always remembered that game, Used to love it . It was years before angry birds and android . But this is a disgrace try porting crazy penguin 1 into android i am sure people would love it, and while you are at it try porting Bull Run too . You guys used to make such classic games but now..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not a patch on the original
reviews.comment: I had crazy penguins on the Nokia 5230 a few years back and it was class, this however is clunky and awkward. For people who don\'t know it was around before Angry Birds they will probably think it is a poor imitation.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very low game
reviews.comment: I dun like tis game though ! It will b fun if the screen can b zoom in n out like angry birds games. If the screen cannot b zoom how can us predict the distance 2 launch the penguin ?! So im gonna uninstall it !
